Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory186.png'}
{3: "You replied to Wanshi's message and arranged to meet him at this park."}
{3: 'It does not take long before you hear footsteps behind you, and a hand gently pats you on your shoulder.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Happy birthday, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I never mentioned today was my birthday.', 3: '9'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "This isn't the first time I celebrate your birthday.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Wanshi sits down next to you on a bench in the park, looking over at you.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "But it's the first time I celebrate it with you only.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Is it better with just the two of us?', 3: '13'}
{3: 'Wanshi nods.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'I prefer the peace and quietness.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Besides, there were so many people on your last birthday that I could hardly talk to you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'The time I get to spend alone with you is precious.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Wanshi smiles calmly, but the condensation at the root of his hair silently reveals the rush he has been in.'}
{2: 'Was there an emergency mission?', 3: '19'}
{2: "You haven't had a proper rest today?", 3: '21', 4: 'Are you okay?', 5: '21'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "I'm fine. You can check.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Wanshi suddenly leans in, pressing your hand beneath his squinted eyes to rub his cheeks gently.'}
{3: 'You feel the touch of the bionic skin at your fingertips. It is a softness that is unique to Constructs.'}
{3: 'It is also slightly warm.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "See? Everything's fine, right?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before you can respond, he leans back naturally and reaches into his bag before pausing as if remembering something, his eyes revealing a hint of helplessness.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "I actually prepared a cake for you, but... don't freak out.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Why would I freak out?', 3: '31'}
{3: 'Wanshi slowly takes out a squished paper box from his bag. The cake inside is crushed, but you can tell how delicious it would have looked.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'I bought it this morning. The mission was urgent, so I carried it with me... as you can see.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'You bought it this morningâ€”wait, morning?', 3: '34'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'I saw you queuing at that dessert shop during our last break, but they sold out when it was your turn.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Only those who line up early in the morning can buy one, right?', 3: '36'}
{3: 'Wanshi remains silent and quietly leans in again.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'You have to wake up at first light to make it.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'His light golden eyes gaze at your face as if contemplating how to trade this great sacrifice for a greater "gift."'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "This is the earliest I've gotten up all year, not counting all-nighters. It should be considered overtime.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "As for the compensation, I need to think about it. Let's... Huh? It's crushed. Do you still want to eat it... Mmm!", 4: '1'}
{3: "Using the accompanying metal spoon, you scoop a small piece of cake into Wanshi's mouth before tasting a piece yourself as he watches."}
{2: "It's delicious.", 3: '47'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Hmm... If you like, I can go buy another slice tomorrow morning.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'As long as you like it.', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Raise the spoon again)', 3: '50'}
{3: 'Wanshi licks the cream off his lips, smiling slightly before accepting it again.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Then, once again... Happy birthday, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Next time, I'll give you a more complete gift.", 4: '1'}
